name: FortifyOnDemandStatic
description: Submit code for HPE Security assessment
author: HPE

inputs.name: FortifyProjects
inputs.label: Projects for Fortify on Demand
inputs.helpMarkDown: The relative path to the project or solution to scan with Fortify on Demand. Wildcards can be used. For example, `**\*.sln` for all sln files in all sub folders.

inputs.name: BSIUrl
inputs.label: Build Server Integration URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Generate a BSI URL. For more information, see https://hpfod.com/Docs/en/Content/20_Applications/1_Tenant_Apps/06_App_Tabs/09_BuildServer/BSI_Using.htm

inputs.name: ScanPreferenceType
inputs.label: Scan Preference
inputs.helpMarkDown: We recommend Standard for most scans.  By selecting Express, our team of static operators will attempt to perform a lightweight, faster scan by adjusting Fortify SCA scan settings to modify the depth and thoroughness of analysis, which may change the number of issues identified in the scan.

inputs.name: AuditPreferenceType
inputs.label: Audit Preference
inputs.helpMarkDown: We recommend Manual review for most scans. This option determines whether a security expert will manually review the scan results and remove false positives.  Selecting Automated will automatically suppress false positive identified by Fortify Scan Analytics with high confidence and publish the results without human review, which can reduce the turnaround time. False positive challenges cannot be requested for identified issues if Automated is chosen.

inputs.name: OpenSourceComponentAnalysis
inputs.label: Open Source Component Analysis
inputs.helpMarkDown: Identifying Open Source libraries produces an application bill of materials detailing a list of identified components and risks. The result is a report of identified Open Source components and known vulnerabilities leveraging Sonatype. No code leaves the FoD environment and the data found does not impact your vulnerability count or risk rating.

inputs.name: IncludeThirdPartyLibraries
inputs.label: Include Third Party Libraries
inputs.helpMarkDown: This option includes third-party code and authorizes HPE to assess the code for vulnerabilities for inclusion in reports, vulnerability count and risk rating. I acknowledge that my organization has received consent from all third-party vendors to scan their libraries. Including third-party libraries will lead to longer turnaround times.

instanceNameFormat: Run Fortify on Demand static assessment on $(FortifyProjects)
